required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of a Proprietary Dietary Supplement on Fecal Volatile Organic Compounds
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of a Proprietary Dietary Supplement on Fecal Volatile Organic Compounds - a Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Double-blind, Cross-over Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to determine the effects of both an anthocyanin-rich polyphenol blend and an anthocyanin-rich polyphenol blend combined with a prebiotic blend on fecal microbiota metabolism (assessed by gas chromatograph - mass spectrometry (GC-MS) headspace analysis) and fecal microbiota composition (assessed by next generation sequencing).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fecal volatile methyl sulfides at day 21, day 63, day 105
primary_outcome.description: assessed by gas chromatograph - mass spectrometry (GC-MS) headspace analysis

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in all fecal VOCs at day 21, day 63, day 105
Change from baseline fecal short chain fatty acids at day 21, day 63, day 105
Change from baseline fecal microbiota composition at day 21, day 63, day 105

arm_group.description: Participants will receive three treatments, for three weeks each, with 21 day washout period between each product.
Participants will receive three treatments, for three weeks each, with 21 day washout period between each product.
Participants will receive three treatments, for three weeks each, with 21 day washout period between each product.
Participants will receive three treatments, for three weeks each, with 21 day washout period between each product.
Participants will receive three treatments, for three weeks each, with 21 day washout period between each product.
Participants will receive three treatments, for three weeks each, with 21 day washout period between each product.

intervention.description: A combination of maltodextrins and red and blue food colors.
A combination of blueberry extract, black current extract, and black rice extract.
A combination of blueberry extract, black current extract, black rice extract, inulin, and fructooligosaccharide.
